DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to compare the effects and side effects of interscale block performed with Naropin 0.1% cum sufentanil or Naropin 0.1% in shoulder surgery.
DOC.brief_title: The Addition of Sufentanil Interscalene Block in Shoulder Surgery
DOC.detailed_description: The purpose of this study is to compare the duration of postoperative analgesia and supplemental opioid consumption and side effects of interscale block performed with Naropin 0.1% cum sufentanil or Naropin 0.1% in shoulder surgery
DOC.criteria: ASA IIII Age 1880 Shoulder surgery performed under interscalene block and general anesthesia Contraindication of interscalene block Severe chronic obstructive lung disease Noncooperative patient Intolerance to opioids Pregnancy Rheumatoid arthritis and diabetes with peripheral polyneuropathy Chronic pain or daily opioid intake
